mapper.insert: INSERT INTO admin (admin_id, admin_password, admin_name, department, position, admin_email, admin_phone, gender) VALUES (#{adminId}, #{adminPassword}, #{adminName}, #{department}, #{position}, #{adminEmail}, #{adminPhone}, #{gender})
mapper.select: SELECT admin_id , admin_name , department , position , admin_email , admin_phone , gender , is_deleted FROM admin ORDER BY admin_id DESC

SELECT admin_id , admin_name , department , position , admin_email , admin_phone , CASE WHEN gender = 'M' THEN '남' WHEN gender = 'F' THEN '여' END AS gender , is_deleted FROM admin ORDER BY admin_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
